LivePrint LPHomePage NatTreasureHunt LPListPage Login ControlPanel CreateLinkPage TestActivity Register Settings
Game on ! Don\'t have the book yet? Get one HERE Welcome to the National Treasure Hunt App ! Scan photos from the book A Century of NHL Memories to find hidden treasures and win amazing prizes ! START BY SCANNING THE BOOK COVER! Tip: Simply hold your phone over the image. No need to click ! Open LP Open TH Open Test Welcome to the LivePrint App ! To start using LivePrint, click the button below ! Start LP ! Otherwise, click below to access your Company\'s Control Panel Login Select the company(ies) for which you would like to use LivePrint. Open Camera Select Enter your Username: Enter your Password: Login Registerlpc1_button_register Don\'t have an account? Register below: Enter the name of the company and your chosen password. Company Name Password Register Create a new Link by pressing below. Alternatively, you can view/modify your existing links below. Create a Link First, choose the image to be recognized. Upload Photo Selected image: Then, choose the video to be played upon recognition. Upload Video Selected video: Create Link Unknown Company. Please enter the credentials of the company for which you are creating this link then click the button below. Company Name Password
